divs: Sighting Detailson april 11 noticed two stationary globes in western sky. using binoculars noticed globes changing colors in a fluid manner..red,blue,yellow,orange. then noticed a second globe to the north with same color changing activities. watched for several minutes. on april 10 my wife and i saw them again for an extended period 15-20 minutes until we went back in. saw again last night (april 13) i first noticed at 10 p.m. thru 11 p.m. still there when i went to bed. will view tonight at nite fall. weather was extremly clear and mild. other stars were plentiful but not changing colors. if it was an atmospheric condition why did the other stars not share the color changing?
trends: There has been one other sighting in Frenchburg
There were no other sightings in Frenchburg on or around April 12th 2010
